name: The Poisoner (Demo)
description: Immerse yourself in a dark atmospheric thriller. You with your friend are police detectives on the trail of a dangerous criminal. Solve logic puzzles using your intuition and be ready for an adrenaline rush.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 equivalent Storage: 3 GB available space
